tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE LegislativeData (
  legislator_id INT,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  party VARCHAR(50),
  district VARCHAR(50),
  policy_change_date DATE,
  policy_change_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE legislators (
  id UUID,
  full_name TEXT,
  party TEXT,
  state TEXT,
  district INT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE bills (
  bill_id UUID,
  bill_title TEXT,
  bill_type TEXT,
  introduction_date DATE,
  status TEXT,
  sponsor_id UUID
);

CREATE TABLE hearings (
  hearing_id UUID,
  hearing_title TEXT,
  committee TEXT,
  hearing_date DATE,
  location TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE votes (
  vote_id UUID,
  bill_id UUID,
  legislator_id UUID,
  vote_choice TEXT,
  vote_date DATE
);
